rationale: States WastewaterSCAN... has begun scaling up H5-specific testing of samples from all of its 190 sites.
statement_text: WastewaterSCAN, an infectious disease-tracking sewage surveillance network led by Stanford University and Emory University in partnership with Verily Life Sciences, has begun scaling up H5-specific testing of samples from all of its 190 sites at treatment plants across 36 states.
